title: Scientific Writing Workshop for Online Collaborative Writing Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Process for science field managers to acquire collaborative writing skills for team projects. Focuses on learning strategies for real-time/asynchronous communication and utilizing web-based tools like Google Docs and Notion

learning_goals: Using collaborative web tools, learners can draft science reports three or more times and submit revised versions incorporating peer feedback.
In online collaborative environments, learners can apply two or more strategies that focus on content organization rather than textual space when writing.
Learners can analyze communication conflict cases arising during collaborative writing and present team-based solutions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
